name: Dean Russell
description: Dean Russellwas the husband and racing partner ofClaire Russellprior to his death. Dean was close friends with Claire even before she transitioned from male to female. The two eventually married and would participate in Dean's passion of street racing. Dean had developed a rivalry with fellow racer andcorpoPeter Sampson. It was against Peter that Dean lost his life, as during a race, the two got into a crash that killed him. His wife Claire survived the accident and, despite violent crashes and fatilities being an accepted part of the deadly street races, she blamed Peter for it, believing he...
